attributes.action: Stop COVID-19 testing being a condition for citizens to leave & enter Britain.
attributes.additional_details:
The use of PCR & rapid antigen testing is an expensive, erroneous, & invasive medical procedure being used to determine the fundamental rights of citizens to leave & return to their own country. 

Such prophylaxis is highly contentious as a requirement of passage or entry to any nation, under the International Health Regulations (2005) of which a core principle is 'full respect for the dignity, human rights, and fundamental freedoms of persons' in line with the UN Charter & WHO.
attributes.background: We want the Government to stop COVID-19 testing as a condition of departure & entry to Britain. Thanks to the successful vaccination campaign against SARS-CoV-2 & its variants, it is time for the Government to fully restore & uphold citizens basic freedoms and Human Rights as we exit the pandemic.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Testing requirements for travel to other countries is a matter for those Governments, as there is no UK Government requirement for a PCR test to leave the country. 

You could start a petition calling for the ending of all PCR tests to enter England, or you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586189
